Mike Noble (17 September 1930 – 15 November 2018) was a British comic artist and illustrator.
Biography.
He was born in London. He was best known for drawing strips like "Fireball XL5" for "TV Century 21". He also drew "The Lone Ranger" and other comic strips relating to "The Lone Ranger". He also worked for "Zero-X", "Captain Scarlet" and "Star Trek".
Noble died on 15 November 2018 at the age of 88.
